text: Nikolay Timofeyevich Antoshkin (; December 19, 1942 â€“ January 17, 2021) was a Russian Air Force colonel general and politician. He was born in Kuzminovka, Soviet Union. He was known for being in charge over the Chernobyl disaster response. He was a member of the State Duma from 2014 until his death. He was a member of the United Russia. Antoshkin was a Hero of the Soviet Union. Antoshkin died of COVID-19 in Moscow on January 17, 2021 at the age of 78.Nikolai Antoshkin, Who Helped Halt Chernobyl Disaster, Dies at 78 ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Russian military people Category:Members of the State Duma Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Moscow Category:Politicians from Bashkortostan
title: Nikolay Antoshkin
